name: Symbiose
description:
GameJam : TubeCon Festival 2019
Theme : Urban Nature
Award : Favorite Price (Coup de cœur)
Game inspiration : Tetris / SimCity

Synopsis
Build a town that will host people.
If you insert holes, your structure will be damaged.
Experience the 5 blocks types to play with : Residences, Services, Industries, Houses, Parks.

When buidings are binded together they can present some good or bad synergies.

GameDesign
Core Mechanic : Make houses for people
Secondary Mechanic : Keep balance between plants and urban environment
Progression : Tower Elevation 
Narrative : Build a vibrant and balanced ecosystem

Authors / Contributors
